con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper authHeader = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("login").httpRequest.response.responseHeaders["Authorization"] token = authHeader[0] log.info (token) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("token", token);

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("createWorkMonth").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) log.info (slurperresponse.monthDate)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("date", slurperresponse.monthDate);

con:configuration.scriptText:

def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) log.info (slurperresponse.date) assert slurperresponse.monthDate == "2016-09"

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) log.info(messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkDayDate")) assert ((slurperresponse.monthDate.get(0) == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkMonthDate")) && (slurperresponse.days.get(0).actualDay.get(0) == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkDayDate")))

con:config.script: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper authHeader = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("login").httpRequest.response.responseHeaders["Authorization"] token = authHeader[0] log.info (token) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("token", token);

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert ((slurperresponse.monthDate.get(0).substring(0,4) == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkDayYear")) && (slurperresponse.days.get(0).actualDay.get(0) == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkDayDate")) && (slurperresponse.monthDate.get(0).substring(5,7) == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("WorkDayMonth")))
